meanings.definition: An unexpected event occurring after a supposedly conclusive event.
meanings.sent1: The afterclap of the party was when the cake fell on the floor.
meanings.sent2: The afterclap of the movie was the surprise ending that left everyone shocked.
meanings.sent3: The afterclap of the magic show was when the rabbit hopped off the stage.
meanings.sent4: The afterclap of the storm was the rainbow that appeared in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The afterclap of the game was the sudden victory by the underdog team.

meanings.definition: A delayed reaction or consequence following an action or event.
meanings.sent1: The afterclap of the argument came when she realized she had hurt his feelings.
meanings.sent2: The afterclap of skipping breakfast was feeling hungry in the middle of the morning.
meanings.sent3: The afterclap of the joke was when he finally got it and burst out laughing.
meanings.sent4: The afterclap of the decision to study abroad was the amazing experiences she had.
meanings.sent5: The afterclap of the sneeze was the sudden silence that followed in the room.
